attributes.action: Call for the resignation of all social services staff who failed Baby P and we ask that the doctor who treated him be investigated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not know anyone who hasn't been affected by the death of baby P who died whilst under the care of Haringey social services, a labour ward. Its unacceptable for this death to just become another statistic.  I petition the PM to do something about this and call for the staff who were supposed to look after this child to explain why they failed to notice such appalling injuries and how they can be allowed to carry on in there jobs with little more than a written warning.  I call for all staff who were supposed to protect this child to lose there jobs and for more tighter measures put in place so that this can never ever happen again!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
